description: (generic) default term that should be used when the process contains multiple steps
name: multistep

description: (generic) the conversion of substance into a different one
name: transform

description: addition of a liquid to a solution causing solid to form
name: precipitation

description: crystallization through the addition of an anti-solvent
name: crystallization_solvent

description: collection of liquid from vapor with a rotating vessel
name: rotovap

description: remove liquid from solid by pouring
name: decant

description: collection of a solid from vapor
name: sublimation

description: retaining substance on a column through their affinity to antibodies, enzymes, or receptors.
name: affinity_pure

description: stop chemical reaction with temperature change
name: quench_thermo

description: high speed spinning of a sample
name: centrifugation

description: evaporating and condensing a liquid over a long period of time
name: reflux

description: stop chemical reaction with chemical addition
name: quench
